Class Editors

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

      • waitForActiveEditor

        public static final org.eclipse.ui.IEditorPart waitForActiveEditor()
        Waits for the currently active editor. This method blocks until there is an active editor.
        See Also:
        getActiveEditor()

      • waitForActiveEditor

        public static final org.eclipse.ui.IEditorPart waitForActiveEditor(org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPage page)
        Waits for the currently active editor. This method blocks until there is an active editor.
        Parameters:
        page - the page, can not be null
        See Also:
        getActiveEditor(IWorkbenchPage)
